headline: 3 Stocks Warren Buffett and Berkshire Were Gobbling Up in Q4
summary: Berkshire leaned into DPZ, CVX, and CB, favoring franchise royalties, upstream output, and insurance float over high-growth tech bets.

headline: Berkshire’s Bigger Chubb Stake And New Actuary Prompt Fresh Valuation Look
summary: Berkshire Hathaway has significantly increased its holding in Chubb (NYSE:CB). Chubb has announced executive leadership transitions, including the appointment of Scott Henck as Group Chief Actuary. Chubb sits among the large global property and casualty insurers, writing coverage for commercial clients, personal lines, and specialty risks. For an insurer, who sets prices and reserves is central to how the business runs, so an expanded Berkshire Hathaway stake combined with a new Group Chief...

headline: BMO Capital Increases Chubb (CB) Target, Cites Earnings Growth Potential
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) is included among the 14 Best Warren Buffett Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 10, BMO Capital analyst Michael Zaremski raised his price objective on Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) to $326 from $286. The analyst reiterated a Market Perform rating on the stock. He reviewed its fourth-quarter results and noted that while many […]
